trends: There has been one other sighting in Brewerton
There were no other sightings in Brewerton on or around December 24th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a yellowish to orange light that appeared star like traveling low in the sky moving east to west while driving with my wife to a friends house.it was a totally clear sky with stars. I stopped at a stop sign then we saw a second light following ,thinking they were helicopters i turned the engine on the truck off to listen to the sound there was silence as they continued west. my wife wanted to go so i continued about a block to my friend house still watching the lights as i drove i went in to call my friends out to see the lights. one was still there but further away and much higher in the sky {note i was traveling east all the while} Gary and Diedra saw the odd star like light immediately, it seemed to have stopped. as we watched on a commercial jet was coming in from the north at a lower altitude, before the jet came inline with the light it started to move again, suddenly it shot to the sky at a great speed and disappeared. Brewerton NY 7:30- 8:00 PM 12-24-11
Summary: I saw a yellowish to orange light that appeared star like traveling low in the sky moving east to west while driving with my wife to a friends hous
